contentrichtext.text: The following is a thus far incomplete list of worldwide [[ant]] [[genus|genera]]. Those no longer considered current nomenclature are marked with an asterisk (*). Genera are often named after famous [[myrmecology|myrmecologists]] - e.g. ''[[Donisthorpea]]'' was named to honour [[Horace Donisthorpe]], ''[[Forelius]]'' for [[Auguste Forel]], ''[[Janetia]]'' for Charles Janet, ''[[Wheeleriella]]'' for [[William Morton Wheeler|William M. Wheeler]]. See the [[myrmecology|list of notable myrmecologists]] for a compilation of these people. {{AlphanumericTOC|numbers=|sections=|u=|y=|z=}} == A == *''[[Acamatus]]'' *''[[Acanthognathus]]'' *''[[Acanthomyops]]'' *''[[Acanthosticus]]'' *''[[Acromyrmex]]'' *''[[Adetomyrma]]'' *''[[Aenictus]]'' *''[[Allomerus]]'' *''[[Amblyopone]]'' *''[[Amblyteles]]'' *''[[Anergates]]'' *''[[Anochetus]]'' *''[[Anonychomyrma]]'' *''[[Aphaenogaster]]'' *''[[Apomyrma]]'' *''[[Asphinctanilloides]]'' *''[[Atta (genus)|Atta]]'' *''[[Azteca (ant)|Azteca]]'' ==B== *''[[Brachymyrmex]]'' *''[[Bothriomyrmex]]'' ==C== *''[[Camponotus]]'' *''[[Cardiocondyla]]'' *''[[Carebara]]'' *''[[Cataglyphis]]'' *''[[Cephalotes]]'' *''[[Cerapachys]]'' *''[[Chelaner]]'' *''[[Cheliomyrmex]]'' *''[[Colobopsis]]'' *''[[Crematogaster]]'' *''[[Cryptocerus]]'' *''[[Cyphomyrmex]]'' ==D== *''[[Daceton]]''<!-- Zootaxa 1749: 27 --> *''[[Diacamma]]'' *''[[Dinoponera]]'' *''[[Diplomorium]]'' *''[[Discothyrea]]'' *''[[Doleromyrma]]'' *''[[Dolichoderus]]'' *''[[Donisthorpea]]'' * *''[[Dorymyrmex]]'' *''[[Dorylus]]'' ==E== *''[[Eciton]]'' *''[[Ectatomma]]'' *''[[Ephebomyrmex]]'' *''[[Epoecus]]'' *''[[Epipheidole]]'' *''[[Erebomyrma]]'' *''[[Euponera]]'' ==F== *''[[Forelius]]'' *''[[Formica]]'' *''[[Formicoxenus]]'' ==G== *''[[Gigantiops]]'' ==H== *''[[Harpagoxenus]]'' *''[[Harpegnathos]]'' *''[[Heteroponera]]'' *''[[Holcoponera]]'' *''[[Huberia]]'' *''[[Hypoclinea]]'' *''[[Hypoponera]]'' ==I== *''[[Ichnomyrmex]]'' *''[[Iridomyrmex]]'' ==J== *''[[Janetia]]'' * ==K== *''[[Kalathomyrmex]]'' Klingenberg, C. & Brandao, C.
